EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1337972634.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Michelle , Some time ago you were referred to MBO Partners by one of our Associates, [Insert Name]. I wanted to touch base with you and let you know I’ll be your main point of contact should you want to learn more about our services or have questions about how you may use us for an upcoming project. Any update would be great. If you would like to sign up for our independent consulting brief, please click here <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Each edition will feature: - Spotlights on relevant tools and news - A featured article around key educational topics (such as pricing, client interaction, administration, etc.) - Free links to rich, educational Webinars and highlights of popular past Webinars - A new Independent Consultant success story each month, as told by one of our Consultant Services Advisors - Answers to the most common questions we hear from prospective independent consultants - And access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and information to help you succeed - Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
